tender.title: Dfi Roads and Rivers T-1011 Term Contracts for Road Markings(KT)
tender.description: The Term Contracts for Minor Improvement Works 2020 will include the following work activities: Network Improvement Schemes Drainage Installation Pavement Surfacing Earthworks Traffic Management Traffic Calming Schemes Transportation Schemes Working with Services / Utilities TTM / dealing with live traffic on Public Roads and other associated ancillary works in the following Local Government Districts: MIN1 - Causeway Coast and Glens; MIW1 - Mid Ulster; and MIS1 - Armagh, Banbridge and Craigavon.
